item.description: Collaborating with your Computer Science department @import url(https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Hind); @import url(https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Merriweather+Sans); @import url(https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Droid+Serif:400,700,400italic); @import url(https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Ubuntu+Mono:400,700,400italic); body { font-family: 'Hind'; } h1, h2, h3 { font-family: 'Hind'; font-weight: normal; } .remark-code, .remark-inline-code { font-family: 'Ubuntu Mono'; } h1, h2, h3 { font-family: 'Hind'; font-weight: 400; margin-bottom: 0; } .remark-slide-content h1 { font-size: 2em; font-weight: bold; } .remark-slide-content h2 { font-size: 1.9em; } .remark-slide-content h3 { font-size: 1.6em; } .footnote { position: absolute; bottom: 3em; } li p { line-height: 1.
